projects.title: Automated Species Identification using Acoustic Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to identify bird species from audio recordings with 92% accuracy. The system helps in biodiversity monitoring and conservation efforts.

projects.title: Spatial Analysis of Deforestation Patterns
projects.description: Conducted GIS-based analysis of deforestation patterns in Western Ghats using satellite imagery and remote sensing data to identify critical areas for conservation.

projects.title: EcoHack 2023: Sustainable Agriculture Solution
projects.description: Won 1st place in EcoHack 2023 for developing an AI-powered platform that helps farmers optimize water usage and reduce pesticide application through IoT sensors and ML predictions.

projects.title: Urban Soundscape Analysis
projects.description: Research project analyzing the impact of urban noise pollution on local bird populations using acoustic monitoring and machine learning classification.

projects.title: Biodiversity Hotspot Mapping
projects.description: Created high-resolution biodiversity maps of Kerala using GIS and remote sensing data to identify and prioritize conservation areas.

projects.title: Climate Change Impact on Bird Migration
projects.description: Analyzed long-term bird migration data to study the impact of climate change on migration patterns and timing of various bird species.
